channel.title: Comments on: ‘Religious macho’ among Shuvu Banim
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2011/05/24/religious-macho-among-shuvu-banim/#comment-3112">Yitz</a>.
Please do. If you have time, can you please translate some of the best passages?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yitz.

Please do.
If you have time, can you please translate some of the best passages?

item.title: By: Yitz
item.dc:creator: Yitz
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2011/05/24/religious-macho-among-shuvu-banim/#comment-3110">Alan Brill</a>.
If you are interested- I can PDF and send over rabbi berland's maamer that was given out on Purim day.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alan Brill.

If you are interested- I can PDF and send over rabbi berland’s maamer that was given out on Purim day.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description: Yitz, Want to give a full report with detailed description of events?
item.content:encoded:
Yitz,
Want to give a full report with detailed description of events?

item.title: By: Yitz
item.dc:creator: Yitz
item.description: I was in jerusalem on Purim day visiting shuvu banim and I can say I have never seen such joy love before outside uman.
item.content:encoded: I was in jerusalem on Purim day visiting shuvu banim and I can say I have never seen such joy love before outside uman.
